entry.title: Bird Songs Are Pretty Just Once A Day - Batfam Oneshot
entry.summary:
Author: Kelysha

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,026Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Bruce always pretends he doesn't notice when the Batkids start playing in the cave. He just likes the noise.But maybe he should have stopped it. Now he's in big trouble, and he will have to take care of it while he also learns to be more sensitive. For his children.Or(People usually put another summary here? Uh...)When Bruce brings an unknown object into the cave, he also brings a bunch of future problems for himself. Problems that he loves. But also he isn't sure how to manage.

entry.title: As Below, So Below-Below
entry.summary:
Author: muscovite

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,304Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 27

Summary: A mansion with an English butler traditionally has two layers: the plush lives of the owners above-stairs, and the hidden bustle of the staff below. Wayne Manor has a secret third thing.Bruce wants to build a Batcave. Alfred cannot be incinerating the candle at both ends. He needs staff. And, difficult as it is to admit, he needs much more help than Master Bruce would possibly trust. But a butler is well used to smoothing over appearances. The owner and his increasingly large family need not know exactly how many people are paddling like mad underneath.They need not know about the unusual ability of the admirable and lovely Ms. Kyle, either.A fic about community, told in part through the eyes of the workers who bless this mess.

entry.summary:
Author: Stsrmoonlit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,484Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 7

Summary: It's a story written about the Batman family and It's about Bruce Wayne adopting a child again with this child being different from the rest of his other adopted children and the entire Wayne family became overprotective of this child and so did their friends but this child has a secret and can she keep it from her new family or will they find out her secret and I've made my own character, hope you like this

entry.title: I will find you, whenever you are
entry.summary:
Author: Florchus

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,833Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 95

Summary: One accident scatters the Robins across time. Dick. Jason. Tim. Damian. Alone in unfamiliar eras, they must survive long enough to find each other again. Meanwhile, Bruce is left with silence where his family should be — and the growing fear that time might bring them back as strangers.

entry.title: Mr. and Mrs. Wayne
entry.summary:
Author: GothamNocturne

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,646Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 6

Summary: Bruce Wayne finally chooses the life he once believed he couldn't have - a wife, a daughter, and a world he's trying to hold together.But peace in Gotham never comes without a cost.When an old debt pulls Selina into something she can't walk away from, secrets begin to fracture the foundation of both their marriage and the Justice League. As whispers of invasion spread and trust begins to erode, Bruce is forced to make an impossible choice:Stand with the world.Or stand with his family.Because sometimes the greatest threat isn't the one descending from the stars -It's the one everyone believes is already inside your home.And this time, the cowl may not survive the cost.

entry.title: Another Perspective
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 71,229Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 407

Summary: A clash of opposing plans causes Batman to accidentally be doused with a hybrid of not-quite-Fear Toxin and Ivy's pheromones. In order to cope with the opposing influences, his brain convinces him that the four Rogues who were keyed to them - Scarecrow, Ivy, Harley Quinn, and Riddler - have been deaged into children. Obviously he'll have to bring them home and look after them until an antidote is made. Meanwhile, by order of the Batkids in order to NOT break Batman's mind, said Rogues are forced to play along.

entry.title: Lights! Cameras! And ACTION!
entry.summary:
Author: Fishwithabow

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,880Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 90

Summary: You are Bruce’s Wayne only BLOOD daughter. He adopted you when you were nine following your mother’s sudden death. Your mother used to be a well known actor and so of course, like mother like daughter, you too wanted to be an actor. Your father and your new siblings for some reason tend to forget about you and end up leaving you in their dust. Will that ever change? Will you become famous before they ever notice you? Or will something happen that will change your whole view of your life?

entry.title: The Long Christmas.
entry.summary:
Author: Red Cowling she they (Redtheseer)

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,330Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Christmas Eve, 1980. Gotham City holds its breath. Batman stands vigil over a silent city, waiting for the chaos that always comes with the season. But this year’s threat isn’t the Joker’s bombs or Two-Face’s coin flips—it’s something new. Someone new. His name is Bane. In a single coordinated strike at midnight, Gotham’s infrastructure crumbles. Explosions tear through the city. The hospital burns. The precinct collapses. And Batman’s family—his Robins, his allies—find themselves fighting for survival across a city plunged into chaos. This hulking newcomer moves with terrifying precision, making deals with Gotham’s underworld and transforming the city into his chessboard. Worse yet, he knows things no one should know. Secrets that could destroy everything Bruce Wayne has built. As Batman races against time to save his city and the people he loves, unlikely allies emerge from the shadows. But Bane is always three steps ahead, and his game has only just begun.   **Witness the debut of Gotham’s most calculating villain in this brutal Christmas tale.**

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 194,805Chapters: 37/?Kudos: 345

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Not-So-Solitary
entry.summary:
Author: girlbrainiac

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,864Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 80

Summary: After a mis-aimed batarang throw, Batman managed to hold onto the Red Hood in the subsequent explosion. Fearing that he could lose his son again, Bruce keeps Jason locked in the Bat Cave. Jason is exactly where he never wanted to be: stuck in a glass case amidst a colony of Bats he swore he wanted nothing to do with ever again. More annoying than that, though, they refuse to leave him alone or stop talking to him. Sheesh. Now he almost wished they'd sent him to Arkham. ...Almost.

entry.title: Gotham’s personal devil.
entry.summary:
Author: Agentph03n1x

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,019Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 593

Summary: The day started off like any usual day in the hotel, ghosts huddled around the TV chatting obnoxiously loud, Ester practicing her dark magic, Ben trying to boost his ego and failing in doing so, Nathan trying to work the front desk but scaring off potential customers when his hand goes through keys instead of grabbing them. The same old normal they have become so used to after living in the hotel for so long. However, Abaddon had bigger plans in mind today, yes today on this faithful day, Abaddon was finally going to capture the Moth-man, his arch nemesis since the dawn of time.

entry.title: The ciphers in Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Acrylickat
